description: Atbroker executing non-deafualt Assistive Technology applications
false_positives: Legitimate, non-default assistive technology applications execution
name: Suspicious Atbroker Execution
query: ((process.executable:*AtBroker.exe AND process.command_line:*start*) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*animations* OR *audiodescription* OR *caretbrowsing* OR *caretwidth* OR *colorfiltering* OR *cursorscheme* OR *filterkeys* OR *focusborderheight* OR *focusborderwidth* OR *highcontrast* OR *keyboardcues* OR *keyboardpref* OR *magnifierpane* OR *messageduration* OR *minimumhitradius* OR *mousekeys* OR *Narrator* OR *osk* OR *overlappedcontent* OR *showsounds* OR *soundsentry* OR *stickykeys* OR *togglekeys* OR *windowarranging* OR *windowtracking* OR *windowtrackingtimeout* OR *windowtrackingzorder*))))
author: Mateusz Wydra
oscd.community
